readable.title: 3502897880_8392d0e4de
readable.content: A boy in blue jumps his skateboard off some steps while his friends watch . A boy in blue jumps on a skateboard while two others watch him A group of skaters are at a skate park . A man in a blue shirt is performing a skateboarding trick near stiars while two other men watch . Three skateboarders are in a park .
